content: How quick we are to sell the lives of the elderly/extreme sick just so we can get "free health care". The greatest health care system in the world over all and we want to get rid of it. Why? For month long waiting lines...no more state of the art medicine, no more development of new procedures, and some red star wearing bureaucrat will decide if our parents are young enough to allow a doctor to administer his diagnosis let alone operate. Once health care for all is instituted then the war will be lost. They will have the control over our very lives and dictate in every way they see fit And if you doubt it read Tom Daschle’s book…the play book being used right now. Daschle is out…his book is in.

content: quote: The greatest health care system in the world over all and we want to get rid of it. We do not have the greatest healthcare system in the world. We have the greatest medical advances in the world, but not the best system. Medical bills are one of the leading costs of bankruptcy in the U.S., insurance premiums are going up astronomically, doctors are leaving the field over frustration dealing with insurance companies, more and more people are uninsured, half a million people losing their jobs a MONTH is just adding to it. quote: Why? For month long waiting lines...no more state of the art medicine, no more development of new procedures, and some red star wearing bureaucrat will decide if our parents are young enough to allow a doctor to administer his diagnosis let alone operate. Contrary to right-wingers popular belief, noone is advocating that type of health care reform. In fact, people will be able to keep their current coverage if they so choose. It baffles me why military members, who are the biggest recipients of 'government-run' healthcare, are so adamant against 'government-run' healthcare.

content: quote: We do not have the greatest healthcare system in the world. We have the greatest medical advances in the world, but not the best system. Medical bills are one of the leading costs of bankruptcy in the U.S., insurance premiums are going up astronomically, doctors are leaving the field over frustration dealing with insurance companies, more and more people are uninsured, half a million people losing their jobs a MONTH is just adding to it. It is the best health care in the world because if you can afford it you can get it. Doctors are leaving in droves because of the huge increase in Medicaid/cair patients. The government makes it so difficult to get paid and under market value the docs cannot run the BUSINESS. Premiums going up is because people have the mentality that it is free. They get a pimple and they want three doctors to look at it. If that is WHAT they want to do then fine...but they will have to pay for it. If you lose your job do you lose your car insurance, house insurance, boater insurance? Why is health care tied to your job? You think you are getting a deal on it? 47% of health care is operated by the gov. millions of illegal’s get free health care. millions who can afford health care do not care to. Do your homework quote: Contrary to right-wingers popular belief, noone is advocating that type of health care reform. In fact, people will be able to keep their current coverage if they so choose. That is soooooo far from the truth it is in another solar system. You WILL NOT BE ABLE TO AFFORD the current coverage because the SUPPLY is going to DISAPPEAR. Use common sense. If you own a car repair shop and the gov said...you can only charge so much to paint that, cut this, fix that you would go into a more lucrative business. You do that there are less hospitals, doctors offices, on and on. The costs go up the lines get longer. Nancy P will be able to afford it but I will not. The only way to keep costs down on government ran health care is to ration it! That is it. No other options. You either ration the costs, the volume, or the form of treatment. We have a limited amount of dollars as a GDP. There is no other way. The play book they are following is Daschle’s among others...that is why they wanted him so bad. And they stated that they wanted him because he is the only one who knows healthcare as well as he does

content: How quick we are to sell the lives of the elderly/extreme sick just so we can get "free health care". The greatest health care system in the world over all and we want to get rid of it. Why? For month long waiting lines...no more state of the art medicine, no more development of new procedures, and some red star wearing bureaucrat will decide if our parents are young enough to allow a doctor to administer his diagnosis let alone operate. Once health care for all is instituted then the war will be lost. They will have the control over our very lives and dictate in every way they see fit And if you doubt it read Tom Daschle’s book…the play book being used right now. Daschle is out…his book is in.

content: quote: The greatest health care system in the world over all and we want to get rid of it. We do not have the greatest healthcare system in the world. We have the greatest medical advances in the world, but not the best system. Medical bills are one of the leading costs of bankruptcy in the U.S., insurance premiums are going up astronomically, doctors are leaving the field over frustration dealing with insurance companies, more and more people are uninsured, half a million people losing their jobs a MONTH is just adding to it. quote: Why? For month long waiting lines...no more state of the art medicine, no more development of new procedures, and some red star wearing bureaucrat will decide if our parents are young enough to allow a doctor to administer his diagnosis let alone operate. Contrary to right-wingers popular belief, noone is advocating that type of health care reform. In fact, people will be able to keep their current coverage if they so choose. It baffles me why military members, who are the biggest recipients of 'government-run' healthcare, are so adamant against 'government-run' healthcare.

content: quote: We do not have the greatest healthcare system in the world. We have the greatest medical advances in the world, but not the best system. Medical bills are one of the leading costs of bankruptcy in the U.S., insurance premiums are going up astronomically, doctors are leaving the field over frustration dealing with insurance companies, more and more people are uninsured, half a million people losing their jobs a MONTH is just adding to it. It is the best health care in the world because if you can afford it you can get it. Doctors are leaving in droves because of the huge increase in Medicaid/cair patients. The government makes it so difficult to get paid and under market value the docs cannot run the BUSINESS. Premiums going up is because people have the mentality that it is free. They get a pimple and they want three doctors to look at it. If that is WHAT they want to do then fine...but they will have to pay for it. If you lose your job do you lose your car insurance, house insurance, boater insurance? Why is health care tied to your job? You think you are getting a deal on it? 47% of health care is operated by the gov. millions of illegal’s get free health care. millions who can afford health care do not care to. Do your homework quote: Contrary to right-wingers popular belief, noone is advocating that type of health care reform. In fact, people will be able to keep their current coverage if they so choose. That is soooooo far from the truth it is in another solar system. You WILL NOT BE ABLE TO AFFORD the current coverage because the SUPPLY is going to DISAPPEAR. Use common sense. If you own a car repair shop and the gov said...you can only charge so much to paint that, cut this, fix that you would go into a more lucrative business. You do that there are less hospitals, doctors offices, on and on. The costs go up the lines get longer. Nancy P will be able to afford it but I will not. The only way to keep costs down on government ran health care is to ration it! That is it. No other options. You either ration the costs, the volume, or the form of treatment. We have a limited amount of dollars as a GDP. There is no other way. The play book they are following is Daschle’s among others...that is why they wanted him so bad. And they stated that they wanted him because he is the only one who knows healthcare as well as he does

content: How quick we are to sell the lives of the elderly/extreme sick just so we can get "free health care". The greatest health care system in the world over all and we want to get rid of it. Why? For month long waiting lines...no more state of the art medicine, no more development of new procedures, and some red star wearing bureaucrat will decide if our parents are young enough to allow a doctor to administer his diagnosis let alone operate. Once health care for all is instituted then the war will be lost. They will have the control over our very lives and dictate in every way they see fit And if you doubt it read Tom Daschle’s book…the play book being used right now. Daschle is out…his book is in.

It is the best health care in the world because if you can afford it you can get it. Doctors are leaving in droves because of the huge increase in Medicaid/cair patients. The government makes it so difficult to get paid and under market value the docs cannot run the BUSINESS. Premiums going up is because people have the mentality that it is free. They get a pimple and they want three doctors to look at it. If that is WHAT they want to do then fine...but they will have to pay for it. If you lose your job do you lose your car insurance, house insurance, boater insurance? Why is health care tied to your job? You think you are getting a deal on it? 47% of health care is operated by the gov. millions of illegal’s get free health care. millions who can afford health care do not care to. Do your homework quote: Contrary to right-wingers popular belief, noone is advocating that type of health care reform. In fact, people will be able to keep their current coverage if they so choose. That is soooooo far from the truth it is in another solar system. You WILL NOT BE ABLE TO AFFORD the current coverage because the SUPPLY is going to DISAPPEAR. Use common sense. If you own a car repair shop and the gov said...you can only charge so much to paint that, cut this, fix that you would go into a more lucrative business. You do that there are less hospitals, doctors offices, on and on. The costs go up the lines get longer. Nancy P will be able to afford it but I will not. The only way to keep costs down on government ran health care is to ration it! That is it. No other options. You either ration the costs, the volume, or the form of treatment. We have a limited amount of dollars as a GDP. There is no other way. The play book they are following is Daschle’s among others...that is why they wanted him so bad. And they stated that they wanted him because he is the only one who knows healthcare as well as he does
reply: Health care is already rationed by the insurance companies. They decide who they will cover, what they will cover and how much they will pay.
title: Obama la la land
